title: Client wont even open to patch
body: I go to open my client and it wont even open to the patcher screen. It just shows the league of legends icon for a few minutes then it closes. Please help! I tried uninstalling and reinstalling and nothing has helped.

replies.body: It seems like a setting with your PC could be blocking the patcher from loading.  You should run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your settings are configured to allow access.  I hope that helps!
